question: Who is elected as the Asia 's International Table Tennis Federation (ITTF) as a Board of Director (BoD)?
explanation: India's Dhanraj Choudhary, who represents Asia in the International Table Tennis Federation (ITTF), has been re-elected as a Board of Director (BoD) for another four years along with other continental representatives. He is the former secretary general of the Table Tennis Federation of India (TTFI), will serve his second successive term as BoD at the ITTF.
